title: Jira User Authentication and Dashboard Access Test
description: Verify that users can successfully create a Jira account, log in, and access the main dashboard. The test should confirm that all UI elements are properly displayed and functional across different browsers and devices.
preConditions: Jira instance is accessible via web browser.
User has a valid email address for registration.

steps.expectedResult: The login page loads successfully with all form fields visible.

steps.action: Enter valid credentials and submit the form.
steps.expectedResult: The system accepts the credentials and logs the user in.

steps.action: Verify that the user is redirected to the main dashboard.
steps.expectedResult: Dashboard loads successfully with all projects and recent items visible.

steps.action: Verify that all UI elements on the dashboard are properly displayed.
steps.expectedResult: All UI elements are visible, properly aligned, and functional.
